Name: Crazy Clown
About the game: Crazy Clown - Top Down Shooter, a game in which you need to take your own and destroy all your abusers. You have not only a machine gun in your arsenal. Use all the variety of weapons and crush your enemies. Take revenge on them, clowns can not only make fun! Features of the game: - Hardcore - Beautiful Pixel-Art - Variety of levels - Music
